lead_paragraph: Changes in 2007 increased small donations, curtailed the roles of businesses and political committees and reduced donations from those doing business with the city.
snippet: Changes in 2007 increased small donations, curtailed the roles of businesses and political committees and reduced donations from those doing business with the city.

headline.main: Campaign Finance Law Changed Face of Elections, Report Shows
headline.seo: Campaign Finance Law Changed Face of City’s Elections
headline.print_headline: Campaign Finance Law Changed Face of Elections, Report Shows
